issue.title: [C++] Refine third party dependency
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-199](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-199). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We need to add set_thirdparty_env.sh to set third party related env before cmake.

comments.body:
